item.description:
On June 11th, all 30 taps at Cambridge Common will have beers brewed here in Massachusetts, and their cask will feature a Cambridge Brewing Company creation.

From their website:
Massachusetts Brewer Guild will be in house! From the second we open until the minute we close, we'll be a featurin' 30 Beers from our little state, plus one bad ass CASK. How much MA beer can we consume, in one day? Mark your calendars so you can participate and help us kick off Boston Beer Week! And, yeah . . . we'll let this out - the cask will be none other than CBC's Audacity of HOPS! no lie!
item.how_to_find_us: Tell the host you're w/ the Craft Beer Crew.
item.name: 31 MA beers + 1 Bad Ass Cask
